references.paper_title: Scaling Diffusion Models To Real-World 3D LIDAR Scene Completion
references.reason: This paper is the existing SOTA in 3D LiDAR scene completion using diffusion models which is used as the teacher model in the study.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Model Alignment Using Direct Preference Optimization
references.reason: This paper is integral as it extends Direct Preference Optimization to diffusion models, an area that this paper builds upon.

references.paper_title: ProlificDreamer: High-Fidelity And Diverse Text-to-3D Generation With Variational Score Distillation
references.reason: It presents score distillation which provides an effective pathway for accelerating LiDAR scene completion diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Direct Preference Optimization: Your Language Model is Secretly a Reward Model
references.reason: This is a foundational paper on Direct Preference Optimization, the technique adapted in the current work for diffusion models.
It is the source paper on denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which is one of the important techniques used in the current research.
